title: (x) "Certificação acreditada" italic humanist sans - MS Trebuchet {Arun}
content:
ID this “Certificação acreditada” please!

António

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221230432im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cert_6139.jpg)

 [‹ Nineteenth-Century Title Font (1883) - from pamphlet published in Lamoni, Iowa](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221230432/http:/typophile.com/node/40186 "Go to previous forum topic") [Very similar to Times New Roman, Times, Times Ten, Timeless, Nimbus, Newton ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221230432/http:/typophile.com/node/40242 "Go to next forum topic")
author: afonseca1974

comments.content: Looks like the italics on good old Trebuchet
